title: France : public debt 2017 to 2022
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of GDP, containing a total of 6 data points.
Overall Share of GDP has decreased over the Year.
Share of GDP is roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and finally slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2022.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum Share of GDP, about 97.1 was reported at Year 2019
Minimum Share of GDP about 91.4 was reached at Year 2022
